8_84nXRp7w21iw1SQoeJ7g.text: We had a great dinner. Food was good , but staff could use a little attitude adjustment. Overall everything was to be expected.

kW7Y8alrMwmHD5TOfScIwQ.text: Stopped by for a beer last week and a appetizer. The beers were cheap and the appetizers were pretty good for your standard "bar food". I kinda doubt I'd go back for a full on meal because the place looks a little run down but if you are in the mood to watch football, eat peanuts and tie one on. You are in the right spot. Also, it seems to be more of a country bar type location so if you are in to that check them out on one of the nights they have a band playing. The servers are also very friendly and prompt about taking your orders.

AX-VNBEekEnNu0pNJ7GDsg.text: Last night the smoked chicken wings were tough and chewy. That leaves me nothing to order other than beer and free peanuts. This place seem to attract a large number of NASCAR fans for some reason and they seemed to enjoy their food just fine

ICN_UBPg5P8cgYiI9xvGlw.text: Love this place. I come here with my team for lunch or with my kids when we have our night out. Good food, nice ambiance, helpful people.

AHUhkUQExO0hl-egRxmyVg.text: We meet here once a month after work for get togethers.  The staff is real nice and there are big screen TVs everywhere.  We get fried pickles, Sweet Potato fries, crab cakes, or the happy hour 5-7 shrimp or wings at $0.50 each in sets of 5!  The only complaint I have is that it is so noisy that we can hardly talk.  But then, I guess I am getting old too!

s6U7e6ha2KSX7M22SFiYiw.text: I had a great NC lunch.   Fresh raw oysters, ribs, fried green tomatoes and Cole slaw.   It was great.   Ribs are so tender . . good sauce  . . Oysters are fresh . . $30 with Tip not bad . .

U6kqF02urVtF60GExeVTFg.text: Overall great experience. Caleb Register was a very attentive and helpful server, giving us suggestions on our beer and food choices. Will come back for more!

MlPL4CnDvQMUlyhXmbiRgQ.text: Feels like a neighborhood bar - you can bring the kids or have fun with just adults.  Very casual.  I always get the Jerk Chicken salad with balsamic dressing, very good.  But all the food is good - yummy, unhealthy bar food.  Have had the ribs, burgers, and son loves the chicken kids meal served in a cool paper ship.   Beers on tap are good and specials are always good too.   Service is usually great, sometimes not so great, but we always go back.  Daughter loves the cup cakes.

7FifNiqolNgftsE7YED1Rg.text: We like to go to this Boardwalk Billy's over in the Matthews area on Fridays or Saturdays after a long work week.  It's a nice, casual place to go as a couple or with kids and just hang out.  One of my favorite things is the salted peanuts in the shell waiting for me when I get seated.  YUM.  What a fantastic appetizer.  I try not to think about anybody's hands other than my own touching them before they were placed on the tables.    I'm a sucker for spicy stuff, so I always go for the Buffalo Chicken Wrap or Buffalo Chicken Salad, both with Super Hot or Frank's Red Hot sauce.  Both are good, nothing unique about them or probably any menu items at Boardwalk Billy's, but they're reasonably priced, taste good, and we enjoy the laid back atmosphere.  There's usually some beer on special any night we visit, so I like to wash down the spice with a cold brewski.    The only downside to BB is the smoking.  People smoke at the bar and it wafts over to the tables.  Even if you're sitting outside, you can't escape the smoke from the tables surrounding you.  But, hey, it's a bar.  I mostly expect that.  We get out of Boardwalk Billy's relatively cheap and with full stomachs.  The kids enjoy the (one) free arcade game, so that gives us a breather to enjoy the beer(s) a little longer...

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

kZeDm1jzTY3FIouWA4vZXg.text: To be fair, I arrived at about 9pm for food so I I totally get that the kitchen has slowed down... BUT!!! Don't serve me food that's been sitting in a pot ALL DAY!!!   1. My chicken wings looked like skeletons with a tough skin wrap... dry and tasteless.  2. The meat plate had a blop of BBQ that pooled grease at the bottom... yuck!  The beers were good and cold but that's what saved this place from being a One Star-rated joint...  The service was OK if not a little too perky... sometimes I need to be left alone and not asked all the time if everything is alright. Well, I might have been tired and grumpy but it was still a tad too "in your face"...  ... still bothered by the terrible food...

Rs6suAlFTOkHNTTCRLbTPw.text: Great people and cold beers. And the food is good too. Daily specials on food and drink.

CpKJiL9mN5UzOI5nr6zW_w.text: This place is within walking distance from my house so I go there often.  The bar staff is very nice and freindly.  they have good drink specials every night of the week and it is a good place to watch a game. The food is better than typical bar food and has a wide selection.  I like the cheese sticks and the Burgers.

SX5-DVR2jidErd6K1XOy9g.text: Food was fair, atleast hot, hard to find at 1 a.m..the problem for me is the staff...have tried several times to get a feel for the place...keep getting the same snobby attitude...will go in a pinch, but not my first choice..

GMImX7uPxIKtPf57fIYZrw.text: Great service from the bar even though they were crazy busy. Food was very good and the beer selection was impressive, several local beers along with many other great options. The music is perfect for the vibe here and it's a nice little getaway from the norm.

DnfwpndtXydY7D7IJIvOCQ.text: Great food. Get the chicken fingers tossed in JBO and you can't go wrong. Drink specials are always on point!!! Specials during the week include $3 craft beers and $2 domestics just depending on the day.

5tCToKWtZxVbSxGtSLDGPQ.text: Dinner at Boardwalk Billy's was a great experience.  I ordered the Q Combo which included ribs and sausage.  The sides that came with the dinner were good, but I have had better.  The meat however was excellent in quality and flavor.  The service was excellent also.  Would definitely return when back in town.

YQHLrxjWVbpWIt1l0X0PaA.text: I've been here a few times and the experiences were great. But I had a bad experience with a server Megan. She was short, rude, and even went on to say not to "look at her boyfriend". It was very unprofessional and rude. Quite frankly, I didn't trust her with my food afterward. Other than that, go enjoy! Just don't get Megan for your waitress.

pu1MnjUc1NFZ906vD1jFeA.text: Food is average for bar food.  Beer selection average.  Long wait(1hr) for food so this is why it gets three stars.

zgoAj0O8PmN9ghcaHNzxCg.text: Went to this restraunt last night. Service was terrible all around joke staff was down right terrible .the manager was drunk and getting an attitude . I will be sure to never return to this bar agin . also food was old and dry the wings were chewwy and over cooked. Also took me 20 mins to even get a second bud light. Stay away from this place if u want a good experience

NAajB37otX_rxGDDCahwwA.text: For what it is, I think it's good. It's a sports bar! I don't know what some of the people on here want  out of this place. The food is good and there's always a game going on somewhere. I really like their turkey burgers! Definitely recommend!

lm1f3MLmRQ8L44ZoHD54IQ.text: My must have menu item for any visit is Fried Green Tomatos. I enjoy the other location off WT Harris because they have the actual boardwalk

f8pA0tAckqhjZ7VmTJu6GQ.text: This places kind of hold a special spot for my husband and i as it is where we signed the papers to submit our first home bid.  If you are looking for a casual place to sit and drink with friends or family this is a great spot.  They have a good beer selection and a pretty basic menu.  I don't recommend the crab cakes, as the ones I had were burned and tasted like I was eating crab flavored bread.  But their salads are great and the oysters are pretty solid according to my husband.  The staff is a little slack, when we were there there was a waitress (not serving us thankfully) that was sitting with some customers and smoking with them, which I find to be disgusting and incredible unprofessional.  Not sure where the manager was to manage that.  But it is a lively casual place and a good spot overall for just that, casual dining.

QTt5d_RvuFFq6XvAUPYfsQ.text: I've been to the Boardwalk Billy's near UNCC a few times but this was our first time here.  It is an average place with average food, but our waitress was very nice.  We though this place would be packed for the AFC Wild Card game but it was pretty empty.  This location is also much smaller than the UNCC location.  There was nothing inherently wrong with the food except maybe the slaw having too much of a vinegar taste to it.  Fried shrimp, steampot, and fish tacos were all par.  They don't have too much craft beer on tap except for Fat Tire, but that's better than nothing.  We may go again if in the area, but also may not make a special trip to go.

va7psdgb0BbHxcC5C4VgZw.text: I've only been here once after work one night, and the experience wasn't too good.  I remember ordering some kind of burger with a side salad. The salad was very delicious, the best part of the whole meal. I don't remember much about the burger. That kinda says this place is forgetful.  I also believe that the pricing here is pretty ridiculous. That's the main reason why we haven't gone back for such a long time. Maybe we will in the future.  The customer service also sucked the last time we were there. The lady that helped us was rude, and the decor is not too flattering either. It needs to be updated.

aIjdW_eoe5CSE8TGYAwCDA.text: Always good service and friendly staff. Nice local beer selection. My favorite bar in the area. Food is usually good and the wings are great.

cSPqMtp_tzieV4WcrwDpHw.text: Glad this wasn't my first time here or I wouldn't come back. The waiter had a serious attitude. Out of the three parts of my order, only one of them was delivered correctly. And when I pointed it out to our server, he argued with me and said it was right!... and made me feel like he was blaming ME for my order being wrong. Very uncomfortable. He reluctantly asked me if I wanted the correct wings... of course! It's what I ordered!! On top of that he was difficult to flag down. The tude was definitely unnecessary.  I've been let down the past 2 visits to this place. The service has gone downhill, and I've noticed there have been considerably fewer patrons there. They've also changed some of their menu without actually reflecting it on the menu. For example--they got rid of the awesome shoestring fries. Sad day!  Sorry Boardwalk, I've got to downgrade you to 3 stars.

WhB5T3O6TgajwfJfMeg_1A.text: It's not my favorite place to eat however the food is not bad I'm not crazy about the wings but the burgers are good this place gets very busy so I've only dined in once

N6xJV6gG7M_EqUTqT1eFuw.text: Good drink specials. Been there for lunch and dinner and it seems like the lunchtime cooks and servers do a better job. Overall decent place.

n3-MxKAJrgQzJPdM4GfkWw.text: Small bar with some big food. Lots of cold beer and very good service. It the kind of place where they know your name and what you like to drink. Food is fresh and there's a nice patio if you like to sit outside.

XsJbNI6wFpavEyub75XT0A.text: I usually go to the one in the university area but I was very pleased with this location. We sat on the patio and watched the game. Our server was very prompt and nice. I ordered the shrimp in mild sauce with sweet potato fries. The mild sauce was way to vinegary for me. The fries were excellent with honey mustard!! I would definitely go back!!

F7yW-Ah3tCSbAXozhF91fw.text: I love the food! And my waitress Cali could not of been better! She always checked in and brought everything out in a timely manner.

0KGsq4Fnltsrqjm05Px7TA.text: Genuinely baffled about how this place gets such great reviews.  Other than our nice waitress, there was nothing great about our visit.  I got the coconut shrimp, which, while plentiful at 10 shrimp served, they were small and over cooked.  The mac and cheese was super bland and dry. My husband got the shrimp tacos and I tried one and it was only ok. Nothing special at all and had 3 small shrimp.  My son had a burger, fries and chicken fingers. I tried the chicken and it was slightly better than ok, maybe a 3 out of 5.  The patio could be nice but with all the smokers right around the corner by the front door, you'd never know the patio is non-smoking until 10p.  It was quite Smokey at times when the front door crowd was puffing away.  Im thankful for non-smoking restaurants but having to walk thru it to get to the front door, then smell it during a non-smoking patio dinner leaves me wondering why they permit smoking right at the front door. As mentioned, our waitress was the highlight of our visit as she was very pleasant and patient with my son who took his time determining his order. Won't be back and don't recommend.

6-BDi-RWPL0ZfbY6mxmBFg.text: Fantastic food, fantastic waitress. Everything about this visit was excellent!! I ordered the ultimate steam pot and it was great. Highly recommend!

LSbSO4QZ8MX4U6_jeokXgg.text: BoardWalk Billy's  This was a Great place 2 Eat.  We had gd service right from the beginning. Their Peanuts R 2 Die 4 ! Yup I had a lot b4 the meal. Wish I could hv ck'd out their Bar Scene, but we were there for lunch. Shrimp Ribs Corn. Mahalo Susie Q

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Check Out this spread ! Yummy
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Serena &amp; Susie Q Jus Hangin Loose in North Carolina.
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. We found a place 2 eat and talk stories.

j6jiMZi8gUMMY_rVwzKsCQ.text: Decent food cheap drinks and a great place to catch a sports game. The servers are friendly and this is located in a great spot with plenty of parking.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Fried green tomatoes

r5xixfISDv0n8PRvOzCGjw.text: Been here a couple times.  Good bar food and nice drink specials.  The last time I was there will be my last.  The bartender (forgot her name) was awesome, but she was getting off, so I settled my bill with her.  I decided to get another beer from the new bartender, Travis.  He puts my beer down and says "name!".  I tell him I'm just going to settle and try to hand him my credit card and he says "I don't give a f*** if you don't want to open a tab!"  Just moved around the corner from this place and thought I found a cool spot.  Travis ruined that.

_10AD0-VklKZkhygczrUlg.text: This was my second time at this establishment with my Husband. Overall we enjoyed our meals. My husband ordered the BFF (Burger Fingers and Fries), this was our first time ordering this item and figured as the name suggests we would get those three items. When we placed the order online, we selected coleslaw as a side believing that it was in addition to the fries. However, when my Husband called to inquire about not receiving fries, Mary was quite rude. Instead of using this opportunity to explain the menu, she decided to scold/blame my Husband for selecting coleslaw. Maybe BFS (burger, fingers, and side) would be a better suited name to limit confusion. Keeping your tone of voice professional would have made all of the difference.We love to support local businesses, so we'll give this place another shot. Hopefully Mary was just having an off moment and isn't normally so snappy with customers.

IouNcfYwVujWlocHqwmAiA.text: I love raw oysters and was excited to get some good ones at a "raw bar"...nope! They were tiny (smaller than a quarter), warm, and didn't taste good at all. I had to send them back. My fiance got the peel and eat steamed shrimp and they were completely overdone and rubbery.

J5GRM7CTjqjQad6-u6EIjw.text: Went last night to have a girls night out and I order the "purple fishbowl" $22! Now for the size great deal but 2 of us drank the whole thing and I felt like I spent $22 on some kool-aid!  How nice at the bottom of the menu as I was looking back it says all sales final! What a rip off. The waitress was very kind and I even allowed her to try it and she said she didn't taste any liquor but yet there's suppose to be 12 shots in this thing! Now I'm now a heavy drinker so I did expect to get at least a little buzz. I guess looking at how dead the place was it should've told me something! Won't be back!

BGuTOSVBEwHYQjLjCGXSdA.text: My friend commented that she wasn't sure she wanted to pay a cover. Door guy over heard from 8 feet away and was so "offended" he wouldn't let us pay to get in. I know it sounds like there must be more to the story... But there isn't. It was baffling. So even though we took an uber just to go to this bar we couldn't get in. Stupid way to run a business.

23sbKU0xMtTfkXFPdPlW5w.text: I came here on a Saturday night. There wasn't many people inside at all. Despite the place being empty, however, it still took a good 20-30 mins for someone to take our drink orders and bring them out.  I had the don Julio margarita which was surprisingly not bad.   This place is close to my house and the drinks aren't bad but the service is. Don't come here if you are in a hurry

cBZGj8hM-Mt63tBj28JQkA.text: We are visiting family here in Matthews and we were told that Boardwalk was a great place for burgers. It wasn't bad, it was "meh"-- we we're very hungry from our flight so they had a chance at vulnerable people who would like anything, unfortunately the burgers were very dry and over cooked, the fries were probably the best thing on the plate. I should have ordered the wings in hindsight. The service was good, on point and attentive, that was the strong suit--the burgers seemed like they were sitting under heat lamps for a long time. If you need to catch a game, drink some beers and get some wings--this is your spot. However, if you're in search for a tasty burger, look somewhere else.

OLRzcQZLbc4gsjo-qMO8wA.text: Excellent service. Our waitress Amber V was awesome. Her food recommendations were great being that we were from Hawaii and didn't know what to order. Smoked turkey was delicious. Susie Q was amazed by their delicious roasted peanuts.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Sampler platter
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

Exh4UWLSoh3A4Oi8xn51pA.text: Great place to catch NFL on Sunday.  Good selection of drafts on tap.  I like the chicken tenders in honey lime buffalo

UM1IHHRvkea4WLPXA4HWGA.text: Came here with friends one day for lunch. I am a vegetarian while everyone else I was eating with ate meat.  There were no menu options other than sides or appetizers for vegetarian options so I got the mozzarella sticks. They were ok but nothing special or unique. I do believe they made their own marinara sauce which is a plus. They have a small local beer selection on draft as well.  All in all I wouldn't go here again. All of my meat eating friends seemed to enjoy it though. They have pretty standard food options, bar food for sure.

SvkUZuwEHtMzaydmRdc_oQ.text: Good buger and the fried pickles were good too. I catch the game there during football season.

1GSvbyKOOeSJGfOIpryFKg.text: Your typical dive bar. They give you complimentary peanuts, but boardwalk Billy's has never been an "I have to go there" type of establishment for me. Food is decent, usually just get wings when I head out there. Mozzarella sticks are pretty good as well.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Wings and mozzarella sticks.

0CgF5iWgQKDC87zu_WXZ_w.text: Enjoy coming here for lunch.  Michelle is great and the food and prices aren't  bad either.

jzb1HjtEidvuBT7yKRgW-Q.text: What a pleasant surprise! We decided to dine here solely because we had a coupon and were in the area. The restaurant isn't much to look at -- a typical sports bar atmosphere. For some reason, the ribs just sounded good but having been a transplant from Memphis and a bit of a BBQ snob, I was hesitant, but went for it. I ordered mine with sauce on the side. Let me just say that these could rival ribs anywhere! They didn't need the sauce -- absolutely delicious and they were moist tender, and fell away easily from the bone. I enjoyed the sides of fried green tomatoes and slaw as well. My husband said his smoked chicken was good as well, but I think he preferred my ribs. He said our son's smoked wings were also smoked and delicious. We will be back!

be9MYiYScojHdBdcAxDUXg.text: We here for the 1st time last yr with my gruop, we had the best time. Im so ready to go bk the scenery is so pretty & at night its beautiful. The water the paddle boat ride wow, great atmospere. U go U will love it check it out its worth it & we went bk the next day to take birthday pics thats how beautiful it is out he there

WVl-W8DK6XHcZtZedI_Egg.text: The first time they were soo good. The crab legs were amazing! Today thought the crab legs were beat up and not good. I won't be back. But the first time was awesome. Wish they were consistent.

MVWHi4p_y851_cxVKvxKQg.text: This was great! It isn't 5 star seafood, but it doesn't claim to be.  It's great food for the money.  The coconut shrimp appetizer was just ok. But the entrees were delicious.  My wife ordered ribs and I had the steam pot.  The ribs were cooked just right and flavored well.  I swapped out the oysters in my steam pot for an extra cluster or crab legs and more shrimp.  Crab legs were outstanding and the shrimp were delicious.  We were also seated outside on the deck overlooking the water, so the ambience was nice also.  Great service, good price.  Highly recommended!

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

vIX3G8jX3Y1T1vPLEJKa5A.text: Worst place ever! Never EVER again! The service was lousy and food wasn't all that great either...you have to be drunk to love this place. The drinks there wasn't even strong enough for me to even ACT like I enjoyed myself!!!

84mnEgwOHk0cfo0KnCV4yQ.text: I had the buffalo shrimp with Thai chili spice and it was a very generous portion and very tasty.  My friend had buffalo chicken fingers.  Open until 2 am on weekends! We sat on the patio.  Will definitely go back

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Buffalo shrimp
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Buffalo chicken fingers with BBQ sauce

Q8zjUQ-V-V3VGExi2BHF2A.text: Trivia night is a lot of fun on Thursdays. The food is good and the wait staff have a lot of fun.

4-60ywHYNKsDiFOpYSBPFA.text: My boyfriend and I came here on a Friday night around 6pm and were seated right away bit definitely started to fill up though as the night progressed. We were seated on the patio which was great -- it was shaded and there are fans so we could enjoy the beautiful weather without sweating for the entire meal.   Our waitress was very attentive, checking in regularly to make sure we had everything we needed. I ordered a tropical tangerine punch bucket which is a great size and comes in a cute Bacardi bucket. Although it was super tasty, I don't think there was that much alcohol in it. I'm not a complete lightweight, but for a drink that supposedly has six shots I would expect to somewhat feel the slightest bit tipsy. I didn't.   We started with the "world famous" crab con queso dip. I will start off my saying that I do not like seafood but enjoyed this dip. I might have eaten around most of the crab chunks though. But it was pretty tasty. My meal was mediocre. I had the mango BBQ chicken sandwich. I don't know if I would order the particular sandwich again but would gladly try other items on my menu. My boyfriend ordered the steam pot and he seemed pleased. It's no beachfront restaurant seafood but definitely filled that seafood void between trips to the beach.   Overall, loved the atmosphere of Boardwalk Billy's. We will definitely be back for drinks and appetizers with friends.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Mango BBQ Chicken Sandwich
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Steam Pot

jKjaYsIuh41H8CthLk1V3Q.text: Cold beers, decent food and good music. This is probably the best spot in the Matthew's area for pounding beers and oysters.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Free nuts!

3aFgDEriVLzs2BCrwKfOfA.text: We were looking for a casual bbq restaurant on a spare of the moment basis and found BWB on a google search. Very nice experience, albeit small inside, but that added to the 'fun' vibe inside where we were greeted with a friendly atmosphere, attentive server and good quality food and beer.. topped off with a game of musical bingo! Nice.

GBx6vTKW6DehvZcm65r1Yw.text: What you see is what you get at this spot.... pretty good fried seafood and sandwiches but it is by far the best place in Charlotte to get green fried tomatoes....they never disappointment me when I'm having a craving....if you never tried them and your in Charlotte, you have to order them from Boardwalk Billy's

t6X3C2FlnZnQ_MBPYc_Kww.text: Had dinner here our last night in North Carolina and really enjoyed it.  They have an amazing beer list, although I actually tried a hard orange soda!  Our service was good, maybe a little slow, but good.  The menu is a good size.  The husband got buffalo wings but the sauce was not hot so they brought him some hot sauce and after that he loved them.  I ordered a fish and chips platter and it was RIDICULOUSLY HUGE!!!  It was also YUMMY!  Prices were reasonable and the atmosphere was upbeat.  I could see us going back if we were in the area.

VMZvns4G6GdTnefpPBgHWA.text: The food and service go hand n' hand here and both at just mediocre. I ordered a turkey burger and it was really bland and dry. I tried my friends fish sandwich and it too was just ok. Sorry to say I spent my money on this at least my server was nice.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

sZZrpC_ncjwP6S3OsbngIQ.text: Lots of regulars hang out here! I like it! Always good beer specials and you can't beat playing some Golden Tee with a couple friends.  I've been impressed each time I've eaten here too. Good seafood selections. Always enjoy myself when I stop by.

6QS4QUpJCgPp91LRoMOM8w.text: Normally love the food here but tonight they're served me undercooked pink bloody chicken

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. All of my chicken cane out like this. So now I have to drive back to return it and pray this chicken it better..... Annoyed

HpfGD9rJ3LT0vwheG_qZOQ.text: If anyone tells you that this place is not a top 20 contender for best wings in the area, they are lying to you. And, the seafood was fresh and flavorful. The waiter was friendly and joked with us without being overly personal or intrusive. Our drinks were good, and the atmosphere fit the restaurant's vibe. Service was timely and efficient.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Seafood Steam Pot

80U2PPc95PcjBSAhMxnlVA.text: So glad I found this location which happens to be much closer to my house. I got the steam pot $18 with crab legs, shrimp, oysters, potatoes and corn. OMG the best thing you ever had in your life. Everything was seasoned perfect and I loved everything. The staff was really nice and overall I liked it and will surely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Steam pot

b54Iw9H09IPlt4aLbaNrnw.text: Great Food and Drinks!!  Had their steamed shrimp and it was Sooooo GOOD!  The seasonal Pumpkin Ale in October was awesome.  My fiance had fried flounder and shrimp, and their 2.50 Yuengling beer all day every day is a deal.  My favorite part is the complimentary peanuts in a shell! :)  Definitely a great spot to watch the game.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

xx7L7ctuQkwd1rqq61pBCA.text: Went her for lunch to try the wings! Ended up getting wings with hushpuppies and Cole slaw. The wings were great, very crispy and well cooked. They came with spicy sauce which was somewhat tangy, and not my favorite, but the ranch on the wings was pretty good. The one thing I did not appreciate was being charged extra for ranch on the side and not knowing this charge until after I got the bill. I usually like when servers tell us this ahead of time.  I thought the hush puppies were done perfectly. Really crispy on the outside and soft texture in the inside. The Cole slaw had a bit too much of a vinegar  flavor for my taste, but not bad. We also had some orange mimosas which I would recommend, very yummy.   Atmosphere was clean and inviting, staff were very friendly and responsive.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Wings, hushpuppies and Cole slaw
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Mimosa

6VTPyPcRG-uJDdWnZblw9A.text: I have tried reaching out to management 3 times about this incident with no reply. Not even a, "thanks, we will look into this."   I have been to the establishment many times by myself, and never had an issue. I usually come on the music trivia night, and have encouraged my boyfriend and friends to come so they can learn more about american music and be around people who are not Brazilian, they are shy and say no.     Last week, my boyfriend, James (29) and I, Emily (26)  just got off of work. We went to this establishment around 11PM on 5/8/2019 (Wednesday). My boyfriend is Brazilian and knows very little English, as he speaks Portuguese. He does know Enlgish though, but people have to talk very slow so he can understand and respond. My boyfriend and I decided to go to to Billy Boardwalk and have a drink to celebrate my birthday today because I am off to travels for a few weeks. This was the last time we would see each other for a while. We were immediately greeted by a male server, I would say in his 30s, with brown/blonde hair. He spoke to my boyfriend.  I always try and encourage my boyfriend to respond because he is shy and I would like him to try his English more, so I have him a couple of seconds to see if he would reply. My boyfriend did not feel comfortable to respond so I replied. I asked for water and said we would need a couple of minutes. Me addressing the waiter instead of my boyfriend seemed to disturb the waiter. I always give my boyfriend the opportunity to speak when we go out, sometimes he does, and sometimes he does not. It really depends on his comfort level and if he can understand the person. The waiter mumbled a lot and was quiet, so my boyfriend could not understand him. I think the language issue is implied because James looks foreign. Me talking to the server really seemed to catch him off guard. I cannot assume his personal philosophy he has for why he would expect to talk to my boyfriend instead me.  In the preceding ten minutes, the waiter walked over three times in our direction, which was the long way to the bar or the area to gather food. I assumed every time he walked our way he was going to take our order, he did not. Every time he walked by he brushed my boyfriend with his elbow. James was sitting on the outside of the booth. This rubbed me the wrong way, as the waiter had plenty of space and him touching my boyfriend was weird and unprofessional to me. This was not once, and can be chalked up to an accident, this happened three times. This was not a crowded place again, their was only one other table in the common area taken.  My boyfriend and I were not trying to pay attention, as we were just focused on each others company, and again, we had just gotten off work and wanted to celebrate with a beer or two.  The waiter after ten minutes came back. I ordered a Frozen Daiquiri and ordered a Corona for my boyfriend. The waiter mumbled and I would not understand him. He told me he could not serve us because he felt my boyfriend was too intoxicated.  I spoke one sentence to him since entering asking to bring us water while we reviewed the menus and from this he somehow got my boyfriend was intoxicated. I explained to him that my boyfriend spoke very little English. If he had asked for our ID's, which he did not, he would have seen the Brazilian Passport my boyfriend carries around. The waiter kept mumbling and I could not understand him. I was embarrassed because this has never happened. This coupled with the brushing up against my boyfriend, I got up and told my boyfriend we would go somewhere else to celebrate.  I really like this establishment, I do not know if I would come back, and I do not think I would being my Brazilian boyfriend or any of his friends. I understand the right to refuse, as I have worked in the food industry, though I am astonished at him being refused because of his lack of English skills. I find this very culturally insensitive to entire groups of people. The waiter could have engaged us any sort of conversation to try and confirm his suspicions, if he thought we or he was intoxicated.  Did you go anywhere else tonight? Are you both from the area? What brings you out tonight?  Nothing, just "your boyfriend didn't respond to me when I mumbled a greeting, you did, so he must be drunk."  I understand things happen, maybe this waiter had a long day, needs more training, or quite frankly just is not too smart. I could barely understand him and had to ask him several times to repeat himself because he seemed timid and was mumbling. That combined with him continuously brushing up against my boyfriend just was completely a turn off for this establishment.  I am very surprised I have come here many times and had great experiences, the one time I bring a foreigner we are refused service. Whole situation leaves a bad taste to me regarding this place.

qe8upltSRaK5ZK4_FRqWWQ.text: I really liked the atmosphere here. It was playing a Corinth of rock and country music, everyone seemed happy and upbeat. My waiter was a really nice man named Jamison (I hope I spelled it right) and he was great. The food was good, but the reason I'll be coming back is because of him. He was on point not only with making sure my drink was refilled but helped me make some great food decisions for my lunch today. It is moderately busy and he was great at keeping up with everyone. We need more people like him around. One of the things that really gets to me when I sit down somewhere is when my drink is empty and I never get checked on and he was on top of it, not to much where I felt like he was bugging me but just the right amount.   The food was good as well the cost compared to what I got was pretty good. The blackened chicken tacos and Mac and cheese were great.   Kudos to this place

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. These brisket nachos were great
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Blackened chicken tacos and Mac and cheese (the Mac and cheese was amazing)

Rq92K63PETpVhexhd3-Fcg.text: Checking in for Jeep Night...1st time here. Ordered the Burger, cheese and bacon and a side of fries. Burger tasted good. Fried onions on top were the best part! Bacon was cremated. Over all decent meal.

75K7o5bAa9Ntf-mc3RRyvA.text: The service was average. The left several items off of what I ordered. I had to ask for a menu and show them what they left out. I was accommodated but it took away from the experience. Then I finally got it all together it was average tasting.

pjzOeM1QKMffLN4rlykFdQ.text: Still going down hill, burgar was so over cocked and dry, wings just tastlies, service at bar sub par, so sad

gvC8vpiwXyImrb0Xzu8WGg.text: Went here for a softball end of season party and was not disappointed.  Our server was Faith and she was EXCELLENT!  High energy, remembered our orders (without writing it down, incidentally).   She was very sweet and attentive and was a BIG part of what made our experience enjoyable.  Over and above the service was the food quality.  Everything was delicious, quickly delivered, and served hot.  A+!

pXO4meXny-s4S1S6w7L29w.text: I still love this restaurant. Was a little disappointed in the wait staff today. My server acted like he hates his job. Said the bare minimum to me. I wasn't even done ordering before he took my menu and started walking away. Basically finished my order while looking at his back. Pretty sure he wanted to get back to standing around and watching the World Cup instead of working. It just rubbed me the wrong way. The food was still delicious. I went with my regular, chicken finger plate with the chicken fingers tossed in franks red hot and added cheese to the fries.  Been ordering it for years and it never disappoints. Food was delicious and came out piping hot. I will be back!

Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Dining area
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. Dining area

VOOSl1sDYCN5YMw2lVLPNw.text: We usually LOVE this place, so we thought it would be a great location to go for my husbands 25th birthday... food was good as usual, but atmosphere and employees were not.   We sat out on the front patio, since it was a nice night and they were a little busy. Unfortunately so did some of the staff, more specifically a young man referred to themselves as the kitchen staff or "managers in training". All while they screamed "hey Vagina!" And "what's up bitch!" Among other colorful language to people that joined them.   Hey, you do what you want on your own time, but while your in a small space with other people (and multiple young children) be respectful, especially at your place of employment. Highly disappointed If these individuals become managers.

5GBkNFgTQQDq2g0-EmFodg.text: Got one of the buckets. The bartender was great and the environment is nice. I really enjoyed myself. My girlfriend and I stayed for about 2 hours. We arrived around 11:30 on a Friday night... definitely a place to check out if you're looking for good food, good drinks and a nice environment. Try the Berry Lemonade if u want something sweet that's creeps up on u.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States. One of the buckets...

6UA81w1OibLTxTssgzAHGA.text: Took forever to get someone to come to our table -kinda dirty and sticky. Came here years ago when smoking was allowed and we walked out then. Thought Id give it another chance, however not much has changed except the smoke.   Parking lot, casual dress, never used the restroom.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

D_3GJRS8xZgJv5Opg9fqBA.text: The location is hidden in the back of a shopping center your GPS won't pick it up so keep your eyes open. When I got out of the car I was greeted by a regular that was outside smoking and she was super nice. I then went into the restaurant and sat myself. I took a look around and the first thing I saw was a large board with a NEW BEER selection which was a decent amount of draft/bottled beer of all types.   The menus is pretty diverse from seafood, wings, sandwiches, and more. I ordered a founders porter (beer) which was $4 not a bad rate and the Party platter($25) of seafood. The food was good but no vet much seasoning on it and not enough to fill you up. If your hungry either upgrade or don't get the Party platter. I then ordered the smoked chicken wings and they were amazing!   The service was really good, beer was ice cold, specials daily, and if you like to talk to regulars sit by the bar.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

SeJjX7Lp0fIJdEM8GVqeXw.text: Love this place - great locations, very good food and a great variety to suit everyone's taste.  Great beer selection and lots of free peanuts!!  I've been here a couple times, most recently April 28 - Prom Night for some.  I was told there was a 90 minute wait for a table, but found a seat at the bar.  Within 30 minutes we were seated outside on the deck which is really nice at sundown.  I tentatively tried the BBQ, but was very surprised at how well this non-BBQ place pulled it off.  Would definitely go back for more.  Really fun and energetic staff, place is not a romantic setting - little noisy, but fun to hang around in and enjoy a good meal.

Js2Gjxwtx6zd9c8bP9vRMw.text: Great tasting food. Excellent wings. Very small and verrrrry fatty briscit.  SMALL portion BIG price. Not enough value to return.

7vz5cxHnf4Jp1JATwYq9cw.text: Stopped by to get a beer and some lunch, the food was delicious, service was AMAZING ... FAITH T. was outstanding, very personable and not just with me she acknowledge every customer coming and going making sure to speak to everyone. She makes your experience enjoyable and I would rate her customer service *****.

r-lwUp9DUV5zztn-VHd2-g.text: We wanted greasy good food and we got it! Not the best service, but that was to be expected.

1-4nnQYSmsO0BFE1OzMmkA.text: Great place!  Have been coming for 15 years.  Awesome seafood.  Today was  for football and burgers! Come check it out for game day

I6z2z_sW20xZIHob4pMJXw.text: This is a good option if you are in the Matthews area and are looking for some good eats and cold drinks. The beer and cocktails are a flowing all day long. After inhaling a pack of cigarettes as you enter the front door... You are seated by a hostess then greeted by a free pail of peanuts. A little something for you to chew on as you browse the large menu.  I don't think I have had anything bad on the menu at all! Anything with jerk chicken is tasty as well as their house made Reuben! Don't forget to ask for your fries to be done extra crispy with sriracha powder.. You can thank me later. I've been lucky enough to learn about a secret menu item - pork rinds! Ask for them to be done in the sriracha powder also... Woo!  It's a good place to watch a sporting event, there are several boob tubes placed all around the restaurant. They also offer live music on Sundays which is fun and team trivia on Thursday. A calendar of daily specials will keep you coming back...  I've never seen Billy. Or a boardwalk.

bUx-KRsSu19ociDaeZkUbg.text: Great sandwich for take out last night. Pulled smoke chicken w/ pepper jack cheese added bacon. Get the fries add siracha seasoning. Bar staff always great, locals hang out, cool bar atmosphere. Ashton is great.

photos.caption: Photo of Boardwalk Billy's Raw Bar and Ribs - Charlotte, NC, United States

FGy2RW6Sfy3VuQ6tlrHFqA.text: Average chain-ish restaurant if you like that sort of thing.  There is really nothing that stands out, or that is special about this place or the atmosphere.  That being said, it is not bad, just nothing spectacular.    The service is hit or miss.  Sometimes it can be decent.  There is never a wait to be seated, which is always a plus, anywhere you go!  The atmosphere is open and friendly.    I have only eaten the oysters and they are good!  Never had any complaints about them.  They have oysters available all year round, so if you're craving them, it's nice to know you have a spot to come.  It is very casual environment.
